name: io.github.molanojustin/smithsonian
title: Smithsonian Open Access
description: Access and explore the Smithsonian Institution's Open Access collections with over 3 million collection objects from America's national museums. Search collections, get object details, browse museums, find objects on physical display, and access high-resolution images with comprehensive metadata.
